posts.post_content:
I am looking for a small resale lot of T205's and other C, D, E, and T's for some local shows I started doing again. Budget is 1k or less. Need to be able to make a few bucks on the lot. Condition is key.  Lets see what you guys come up with. 

Please email me with pics and pricing of each card @ [url]sococamo@gmail.com[/url]
